programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Split Persona
programme.desc: The bond between twin sisters starts to fray when their mother starts showing signs of suicidal depression. Still, they need each other - but have they grown too far apart? Directed by Bradley Rust Gray. Written by Mayraleeh Nelson(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Cut in Half
programme.desc: Two Muslim sisters and their family must cope with the eldest daughter's leukemia diagnosis and her decisions about life and death. Directed by Susan Seidelman (‘Desperately Seeking Susan'). Written by Leen Shumman(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Ben (Ben Affleck) has to get from New York to Savannah for his wedding. Everything is under control, until a young woman named Sarah (Sandra Bullock) literally falls into his life. Ben and Sarah's plane goes skidding off the runway and he inadvertently saves Sarah's life, only to find that he has inherited an unlikely travel companion. After being detained, derailed and disrobed, Ben realizes that he's developing a definite attraction to the sexy and impetuous Sarah and the feeling is decidedly mutual

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan

As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara

programme.title: Burning Bodhi
programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: Adult World
programme.desc: Satirical comedy about a naive college graduate who believes she's destined to be a great poet, but in the meantime must move back in with her parents and take a job at a sex shop, while she pursues a mentorship with a reclusive writer. Stars John Cusack

programme.title: L Word Mississippi: Hate The Sin
programme.desc: A provocative and moving documentary that explores the lives of gay women living in the conservative, religious deep South and the unique hardships, bigotry, bullying, sexism and racism they endure. Produced by Ilene Chaiken of 'The L Word' and 'The Real L Word'

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: Listen To Me Marlon
programme.desc: Documentary that reveals Hollywood legend Marlon Brando entirely in his own words -- through exclusive access to the actor's extraordinary personal archive of unseen film footage and unheard audio recordings, comprising the definitive story of one of the most complex and influential actors of all time(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication(n)

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster(n)

programme.title: Strip Club Slayer
programme.desc: When a strip club goer is killed, the dancers hire a bouncer to protect themselves. As the sexual tension grows between one of the women and the bouncer, the mystery of the dangerous killer unravels(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley(n)

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp. Stars Shirley MacLaine, Jack Black and Matthew McConaughey. Richard Linklater directs(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart is a teenager traumatized into silence after a summer party ends in a police raid that leaves her ostracized by her friends but unable to explain her actions. Elizabeth Perkins, D.B. Sweeney and Steve Zahn costar in this drama based on the award-winning novel by Laurie Halse Anderson(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room(n)

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Ben (Ben Affleck) has to get from New York to Savannah for his wedding. Everything is under control, until a young woman named Sarah (Sandra Bullock) literally falls into his life. Ben and Sarah's plane goes skidding off the runway and he inadvertently saves Sarah's life, only to find that he has inherited an unlikely travel companion. After being detained, derailed and disrobed, Ben realizes that he's developing a definite attraction to the sexy and impetuous Sarah and the feeling is decidedly mutual(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel(n)

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: A self-made man who gets engaged to a snooty heiress from a family too stuffy and set in their ways to understand his unorthodox take on life, rethinks his decision after meeting her spirited, rebellious sister. (cc)

programme.title: An Affair to Remember
programme.desc: A man and woman meet and fall in love while aboard an ocean liner en route to New York. They agree to meet at the top of the Empire State building in six months to resume their romance provided they've both ended their current respective relationships. Remake of the 1939 classic “Love Affair.” (cc)

programme.title: Reducing
programme.desc: Comedy short stars Maxine Gates as a woman with a weight problem and demonstrates all of the ways she tries to shed pounds, including exercise and diet. Narrated by Pete Smith. Written and directed by Dave O'Brien, who costars as Gates' trainer

programme.title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
programme.desc: A judge decides that the best way to curb the excesses of a playboy art teacher is to force him to do what he does best--romance a willing young lady, who happens to be the judge's teenage sister and who comes with a hand's-off order. Sidney Sheldon's script won an Oscar for Best Original Screenplay. (cc)

programme.title: I Love My Mother-in-Law, But ...
programme.desc: A husband (Dave O'Brien, who also wrote and directed) tries his best to get along with his wife's sometimes difficult mother (Anne O'Neal). Narrated by Pete Smith

programme.title: People Will Talk
programme.desc: Joseph L. Mankiewicz directed this story about a pregnant student and a physician accused of malpractice. Cary Grant, Jeanne Crain, Hume Cronyn, Walter Slezak, Finlay Currie. (cc)

programme.title: Walk, Don't Run
programme.desc: Three English-speakers forced to share a cramped apartment during the housing shortage of the 1964 Tokyo Olympics find themselves involved in a wacky series of high jinks and romantic misunderstandings. Cary Grant's final film role. (cc)

programme.title: Her Private Affair
programme.desc: Early talkie about a judge's wife who kills a blackmailer, made interesting by Ann Harding's performance. Kessler: Harry Bannister. Carl: John Loder. Julia: Kay Hammond. DA: Frank Reicher. Hartmann: Lawford Davidson. Michael: Arthur Hoyt. Grimm: Elmer Ballard. Ziegler: William Orlamond. Good cast. Directed by Paul L. Stein

programme.title: My Bag O' Trix
programme.desc: Vaudeville star Trixie Friganza acts, sings and plays the bass fiddle

programme.title: Condemned
programme.desc: A love affair between a convict (Ronald Colman) and the warden's wife (Ann Harding). Louis Wolheim, Dudley Digges. Samuel Goldwyn film shows its age. Wesley Ruggles directed. (cc)

programme.title: The Conquerors
programme.desc: A couple opens a bank out West

programme.title: The Life of Vergie Winters
programme.desc: Louis Bromfield novel about a woman (Ann Harding) who becomes involved in murder after falling in love against her principles. John: John Boles. Laura: Helen Vinson. Joan: Betty Furness. Ranny: Frank Albertson. Hugo: Creighton Chaney. Winnie: Sara Haden. Directed by Alfred Santell. (cc)

programme.title: The Lady Consents
programme.desc: Story of marriage and divorce, made interesting by a fine cast and expert direction (Stephen Roberts). Ann Harding. Michael: Herbert Marshall. Jerry: Margaret Lindsay. Jim: Edward Ellis. Stanley: Walter Abel. Yardley: Hobart Cavanaugh

programme.title: The Witness Chair
programme.desc: A woman who may or may not be guilty of murdering her boss watches helplessly in court as evidence piles up against the man she loves. (cc)

programme.title: Janie
programme.desc: A new army base in town leads to teenage girls fraternizing with the soldiers, much to the chagrin of locals. (cc)

programme.title: Eyes in the Night
programme.desc: Tale of a blind detective (Edward Arnold) who tries to outwit Nazi spies and to solve a murder. Ann Harding, Donna Reed, Horace (Stephen) McNally. Cheli: Katherine Emery. Marty: Allen Jenkins. Boyd: Eric Rolf. Lowry: Reginald Denny. Gerente: Paul Emery. Hansen: Stanley Ridges. Vera: Rosemary De Camp. Busch: Barry Nelson. Interesting cast. Good direction by Fred Zinnemann. (cc)

programme.title: It Happened on Fifth Avenue
programme.desc: A vagabond moves into a New York City mansion while the owner is wintering down South and opens the doors to a number of unfortunates, including the vacationer's daughter, whom the squatter mistakes for a down-on-her-luck runaway from an abusive father. (cc)

programme.title: Biography of a Bachelor Girl
programme.desc: A magazine negotiates for the memoirs of an artist (Ann Harding)---with several famous men in her past. Kurt: Robert Montgomery. Nolan: Edward Everett Horton. Feydak: Edward Arnold. Slade: Una Merkel. Kinnicott: Charles Richman. Minnie: Greta Meyer. Directed by Edward H. Griffith. (cc)

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: Adaptation of Philip Barry's Broadway comedy of manners. (cc)

programme.title: When Ladies Meet
programme.desc: Wife (Ann Harding) vs. mistress (Myrna Loy) in a witty, sophisticated conversation piece that discusses men, marriage and morals in an adult and civilized manner. Alice Brady, Robert Montgomery. Rogers: Frank Morgan. Walter: Martin Burton. Fine performances, sparkling dialogue, slick production. Harry Beaumont directed. (cc)

programme.title: MGM's March On In 1934-35
programme.desc: MGM promotional short shot at a 1934 convention in Chicago, where film distributors gathered to see the studio's upcoming movie releases. (cc)

programme.title: The Flame Within
programme.desc: A psychiatrist finds herself in over her head when she falls in love with her own patient, who is not only very troubled, but also is already married. (cc)

programme.title: Double Harness
programme.desc: The unmarried daughter in a once-wealthy family tricks the wastrel heir of a once-great shipping company into marriage, but then begins to have second thoughts about the deed and experiences feelings of guilt. (cc)

programme.title: Screen Actors
programme.desc: Short subject examines the outside, non-acting interests of a number of Hollywood performers, including Dan Duryea, Reginald Denny and Gail Patrick. Directed by Hal Elias

programme.title: The Magnificent Yankee
programme.desc: The life of Supreme Court Justice Oliver Wendell Holmes, who served from Theodore Roosevelt to Franklin D. Roosevelt. (cc)

programme.title: Calgary Stampede
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated short spotlighting the weeklong celebration that honors the Canadian city's Wild West roots. Included are clips of games, music and the colorful annual parade. Narrated by Art Gilmore. (cc)

programme.title: Framed
programme.desc: A young engineer (Glenn Ford) falls into the clutches of a blonde (Janis Carter) up to no good. Barry Sullivan, Edgar Buchanan. Mrs. Price: Karen Morley. Jack: Jim Bannon. Directed by Richard Wallace. (cc)

programme.title: The Mating of Millie
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman who wants to adopt an orphan can only do so if she has a husband. (cc)

programme.title: Human Desire
programme.desc: Fritz Lang directed this triangle yarn from Zola's "The Human Beast." Glenn Ford, Gloria Grahame, Broderick Crawford. Alec: Edgar Buchanan. Jean: Peggy Maley. Ellen: Kathleen Case. (cc)

programme.title: Terror on a Train
programme.desc: All about an attempt to sabotage a train carrying munitions. Glenn Ford. Janine: Anne Vernon. Ted Tetzlaff directed. (cc)

programme.title: Film Fun
programme.desc: Silent movies are given humorous commentary in this short

programme.title: The Fastest Gun Alive
programme.desc: A former gunman tries to settle into a normal life, but when a youngster shares his secret past with a band of outlaws, they threaten to burn down the town if he doesn't duel them. (cc)

programme.title: Dear Heart
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman from a small town attends a postmaster convention at a New York City hotel, where she meets and falls in love with a salesman who happens to be engaged. (cc)

programme.title: Blackboard Jungle
programme.desc: An early film study of teens gone wild chronicles the efforts of an idealistic and dedicated teacher trying to cope with his classroom full of incorrigibles, including knife-wielding punks, in an urban high school. The film launched Bill Haley & the Comets' rock-and-roll anthem "Rock Around the Clock." (cc)

programme.title: Ransom!
programme.desc: Story of a couple whose small son is kidnapped. Glenn Ford, Donna Reed, Leslie Nielsen, Juano Hernandez, Richard Gaines, Robert Keith. Suspenseful. Alex Segal directed. (cc)

programme.title: Experiment in Terror
programme.desc: A bank teller is accosted in her garage one dark night by an asthmatic psycho, who forces her to go through with an elaborate robbery scheme, threatening to kill the teller's teenage sister if the police are summoned. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: Action and family intrigue in the Old West. Glenn Ford, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson, Dianne Foster, Brian Keith. McCloud: Warner Anderson. Caroline: May Wynn. Matlock: Richard Jaeckel. Elena: Lita Milan. Uneven but interesting. Rudolph Mate directed. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Gilda
programme.desc: A casino boss hires a down-and-out gambler to manage his business, unaware that the bettor is his wife's former lover. Rita Hayworth heats up the screen with the famous cabaret number "Put the Blame on Mame". (cc)(n)

programme.title: Pocketful of Miracles
programme.desc: A boozy, unkempt apple seller in Depression-era New York learns her long-overseas daughter, who believes her to be a wealthy dowager, is returning with her fiancé to visit, so the old gal gets help from a gangster in transforming into a society matron. Frank Capra retooled his own 1933 hit "Lady for a Day" for this Runyonesque yarn. The film's title tune was nominated for a Best Song Oscar. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Sheepman
programme.desc: A sheep-farmer battles a cattle baron as they each fall in love with the same woman. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Desire Me

programme.desc: Shawn's ideas on making better use of the lobby space catch the eye of the building's owner who offers him the chance to run a new cafe. But first he'll have to evict Pops. Crump: Michael Winters. Pops: John Witherspoon. (repeat)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Marlon and Shawn get in way over their heads when they start competing for the attention of an attractive psychiatrist (Shari Headley) who's just moved into the building. Pops: John Witherspoon. Dee: Anna Maria Horsford. (repeat)

programme.title: The Wayans Bros.
programme.desc: Marlon and Shawn try to shake Pops out of his depression over his 50th birthday---and in the process create a monster. Dion: Samaria Graham. Dave: George Sharperson. Pops: John Witherspoon. Dee: Anna Maria Horsford. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Tensions spill over just before the wedding of Will's Aunt Janice when Will's mom (Vernee Watson-Johnson) meets Janice's intended (Dietrich Bader). Janice: Charlayne Woodard. Helen: Jennifer Lewis. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Vivian's 40th birthday marks a crisis and a career change in which she plans to perfect her dance skills. Gina: Judy Prescott. Robin: Cynthia Green. Teacher: Nancy Saenz. Vivian: Janet Hubert-Whitten. (repeat)

programme.sub-title: Work Is Work, But Can You Twerk?

programme.desc: In the Season 6 premiere, the Harris family returns as an even bigger brood as Tip and Tameka's baby girl, Heiress Diana, is introduced. However, the biggest news is the separation of Tip and Tameka. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tiny is ready to show that she can be a mother and a strong businesswoman at the same time. Meanwhile, Major is no longer the baby in the family and is growing up too fast. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Niq Niq considers whether she should use her mug shot for merchandising for her new album. Later, T.I. is looking to start over, beginning with his house, but worries as each item exceeds the budget. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Xscape set out to go on tour, but T.I. becomes uncomfortable with the situation when Tameka reveals her plan to take Heiress on the road. Later, Domani's grades are suffering, so Tip takes something away in hopes of motivating him to do better in school. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Domani seems indifferent after being racially profiled, leading T.I. to help his son realize that this action is not acceptable. Later, Niq Niq struggles with finding alone time with her boyfriend, fearing that Tiny is lonely. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Messiah crashes T.I.'s expensive sports car, so T.I. revokes his driving privileges. Later, Tiny has a new business venture as the owner of a co-ed basketball team. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.sub-title: What I Should Have Said Was...
programme.desc: Tip is in hot water after a radio interview in which he called Tameka a distraction. Later, Tip takes it upon himself to reach out to people he's closest with so he can clear the air. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I. and Tiny put on a brave face for their family and throw Heiress a fun-filled christening. Later, the time has come for a decision to be made about their marriage. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: The Kyles' relaxing Hawaiian vacation concludes in a rush: Jay misreads the time on the plane tickets and there's no time to pack. That presents a particular problem for Claire, who bought so many clothes and charged them to their room. Michael won't like that when he gets the bill. Meanwhile, Jr. doesn't want to leave because he's in love with Leilani (Reesy), and Kady won't leave without her doll Pippy, which she buried on the beach. Rachel: Liliana Mumy. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay's getting tired of the same-old same-old on her nights out with Michael, so she browbeats him into taking samba lessons. Making matters worse for him, the instructor---Mr. Roccocco (Jordi Caballero)---is a little friendlier to Jay than he would like. Meanwhile, Claire makes the cheerleading team, and Jr. wants to add his name to the “Guinness Book of World Records.” (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: While making Claire's bed, Jay finds her diary. Of course she reads it, and that leads to a mother-daughter talk about sex. Meanwhile, Jr. takes an unofficial driving test when he takes Michael to an eye-doctor appointment. And all Kady wants to do is play hide-and-seek. Dr. Phil Ling: Gedde Watanabe. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael decides he likes Claire's straitlaced boyfriend, Tony (Andrew McFarlane), so naturally Claire dumps him for a hip-hop swaggerer (Donnell Barrett) who calls himself 1040 EZ (“'Cause I be taxin' my women”). programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 22)
programme.desc: Doktor Cedric Stier, były kolega Meiera ze szkoły, wnosi do szpitala atmosferę rywalizacji. Żona jednego z pacjentów, Silvi, ma wyrazić zgodę na pobranie organów od męża. Takie postawienie sprawy wywołuje otwartą wojnę między Sitierem a Markiem. W konflikt zostaje uwikłana także Gretchen, która ma osobiste powody, by prezentować określone stanowisko w sprawie. Okazuje się, że lekarka nagle zapragnęła stać się chirurgiem z prawdziwego zdarzenia. Co oznacza opanowanie i pełen profesjonalizm. Tuż przed planowaną operacją na wizerunku chłodnej pani doktor pojawiają się rysy..

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 23)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Meier dostaje propozycję objęcia posady ordynatora chirurgii w Nordstadt Hospital. W wyniku niezamierzonego działania Gretchen lekarz zaczyna sądzić, że ma z nią dziecko, co komplikuje mu karierę

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 23)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Meier dostaje propozycję objęcia posady ordynatora chirurgii w Nordstadt Hospital. W wyniku niezamierzonego działania Gretchen lekarz zaczyna sądzić, że ma z nią dziecko, co komplikuje mu karierę

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 24)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Kolejny raz doktor Haase przeżywa miłosne rozterki. Dla odmiany jednak wszystkie znaki na niebie i ziemi wskazują tylko jednego mężczyznę, na którego widok serce Gretchen bije mocniej. Obiekt jej westchnień jest dla niej niestety nieosiągalny i lekarka powoli oswaja się z porażką. Tymczasem do szpitala trafia była wychowawczyni przedszkolna, pani Schnippel. Kobieta miała nieszczęśliwy wypadek. Okazuje się, że starsza pani zna wstydliwy sekret doktora Meiera jeszcze z czasów dzieciństwa

programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 1)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem. Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 2)
programme.desc: Zbliża się rocznica ślubu rodziców Gretchen. Haase ma mało czasu, by znaleźć partnera na tę uroczystość. Przyjaciółka umawia ją na randkę w ciemno, ale kandydat okazuje się niezbyt interesujący, a Gretchen nie dość zdesperowana, by zrezygnować z poszukiwań lepszej partii. Chętnie zaprosiłaby doktora Meiera, ale on upodobał ją sobie na obiekt swoich żartów, z kolei doktor Kaan wydaje się ignorować jej osobę. Na domiar złego na oddział trafia była partnerka ordynatora, Nina, która uległa nieszczęśliwemu wypadkowi. Dzięki temu Gretchen poznaje kilka ważnych szczegółów z życia swojego dawnego ukochanego. Tego samego dnia lekarka bierze udział w swojej pierwszej operacji, której obiektem jest męskie przyrodzenie(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki 3 (odc. 22)
programme.desc: Doktor Cedric Stier, były kolega Meiera ze szkoły, wnosi do szpitala atmosferę rywalizacji. Żona jednego z pacjentów, Silvi, ma wyrazić zgodę na pobranie organów od męża. Takie postawienie sprawy wywołuje otwartą wojnę między Sitierem a Markiem. W konflikt zostaje uwikłana także Gretchen, która ma osobiste powody, by prezentować określone stanowisko w sprawie. Okazuje się, że lekarka nagle zapragnęła stać się chirurgiem z prawdziwego zdarzenia. Co oznacza opanowanie i pełen profesjonalizm. Tuż przed planowaną operacją na wizerunku chłodnej pani doktor pojawiają się rysy..

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 23)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Meier dostaje propozycję objęcia posady ordynatora chirurgii w Nordstadt Hospital. W wyniku niezamierzonego działania Gretchen lekarz zaczyna sądzić, że ma z nią dziecko, co komplikuje mu karierę

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 23)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Meier dostaje propozycję objęcia posady ordynatora chirurgii w Nordstadt Hospital. W wyniku niezamierzonego działania Gretchen lekarz zaczyna sądzić, że ma z nią dziecko, co komplikuje mu karierę

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 24)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase wywołuje chaos nie tylko na oddziale chirurgicznym, lecz przede wszystkim w sercach swoich kolegów. Nigdy nie aspirowała do roli bogini. Jest zwykłą dziewczyną, która robi karierę medyczną i musi walczyć z porywami serca. Jej osobowość i urok osobisty przyciąga do niej mężczyzn jak magnes. Kolejny raz doktor Haase przeżywa miłosne rozterki. Dla odmiany jednak wszystkie znaki na niebie i ziemi wskazują tylko jednego mężczyznę, na którego widok serce Gretchen bije mocniej. Obiekt jej westchnień jest dla niej niestety nieosiągalny i lekarka powoli oswaja się z porażką. Tymczasem do szpitala trafia była wychowawczyni przedszkolna, pani Schnippel. Kobieta miała nieszczęśliwy wypadek. Okazuje się, że starsza pani zna wstydliwy sekret doktora Meiera jeszcze z czasów dzieciństwa

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 1)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem. Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 2)
programme.desc: Zbliża się rocznica ślubu rodziców Gretchen. Haase ma mało czasu, by znaleźć partnera na tę uroczystość. Przyjaciółka umawia ją na randkę w ciemno, ale kandydat okazuje się niezbyt interesujący, a Gretchen nie dość zdesperowana, by zrezygnować z poszukiwań lepszej partii. Chętnie zaprosiłaby doktora Meiera, ale on upodobał ją sobie na obiekt swoich żartów, z kolei doktor Kaan wydaje się ignorować jej osobę. Na domiar złego na oddział trafia była partnerka ordynatora, Nina, która uległa nieszczęśliwemu wypadkowi. Dzięki temu Gretchen poznaje kilka ważnych szczegółów z życia swojego dawnego ukochanego. Tego samego dnia lekarka bierze udział w swojej pierwszej operacji, której obiektem jest męskie przyrodzenie(n)
